nodes.text: Indigestion was a common complaint among many species, which frequently consisted of an unsettled or uncooperative digestive tract. Although usually considered undesirable, in some cases it proved life-saving, namely when Zorba Desilijic Tiure was rejected by the Sarlacc.

The 2002 game Star Wars: Bounty Hunter established that Gardulla Besadii the Elder was eaten by her krayt dragon in 32 BBY. However, the 2010 episode of Star Wars: The Clone Wars "Hunt for Ziro" showed Gardulla alive well into the Clone Wars, more than ten years later. Leland Chee later established that the krayt dragon found her "indigestible."
